3.「地獄の門の封印が 解けている！？| まだ しばらく 保つはずだったのに……！: The seal on the Gate of Hell has been broken!|It was supposed to hold for a while!

6.「すみません セツラン君。| まさか こんなに早く 封印が解けるとは……。: I'm sorry, Mr. Setsuran. I didn't expect the|seal to be lifted so soon.

8.「……手助けなんか 必要ありません！| オレひとりで じゅうぶんです！: I don't need any help! I'm good enough on my|own!

10.「まだだ……まだ やれる！| オレは 戦士とパラディンを極めし者……| ガーディ: Not yet... not yet! I am a warrior, a master|paladin, a guardian!

11.「ダメです セツラン君！| 君は じゅうぶん 戦った。| ここは 僕たちに任せて: No, Mr. Setsuran! You've fought plenty. We'll|take care of this!

12.「行けますね <cs_pchero>君？| 手分けして 片付けましょう！: Can we go <cs_pchero>? Let's split up and|clean up!

15.「いいえ……地獄の門を 再封印しないかぎり| 魔物は 永遠に 生まれつづけます。: No... unless the Gate of Hell is resealed,|monsters will continue to be born forever.

16.「キリカ修道会の僧侶が作る 聖具。| これを使えば……！: A sacrament made by the priests of the Kirika|Monastery. With this...!

17.「魔封のじゅずよ！| 邪悪なる来訪者が残せし 呪いの門を| 今ひとたび 封じたま: Sealing Beads! Seal once more the gates of the|curse left behind by the evil visitor!

18.「……これで もう 大丈夫です。| セツラン君 <cs_pchero>君| よく: ...Now you're all set. Setsuran, <cs_pchero>|you did a great job!

19.「いいえ オレは……ガーディアン失格です。| 団長たちが 来てくれなかったら|: No, I'm... a failed guardian. If the Commander|and his men hadn't come, we would have been in|deep trouble...!

20.「……たしかに 君は 真っ先に| 門の封印が解けたと 報せにくるべきでした。|: Indeed, you should have been the first to|report that the gate was unsealed. Why did you|take the risk of fighting alone?

21.「オレは……選ばれた者しか なれないっていう| ガーディアンを目指して 死ぬほど:
I worked myself to death to become a Guardian,|which they say only the chosen one can become,|and I was so happy to finally realize my|
|dream.

22.「でも オレの ちょっと後に入ってきた| <cs_pchero>が すごいヤツで: But <cs_pchero>, who came in a little after|me, was an amazing guy...so I was in a big|hurry.

23.「地獄の門が 予定より早く開いて 驚いたけど| 手柄を立てる チャンスだとも思っ:
I was surprised when the Gate of Hell opened|earlier than expected, but I also saw it as a|chance to take credit... so I decided to fight|
|it alone.

24.「それは 正しくない判断だったと| 君は もう 気付いていますね？: You already know it was the wrong decision,|don't you?

25.「はい！ だって 手柄とか そんなもの……| ガーディアンには 必要ありません！: Yes, sir! Because, you know, we don't need any|credit or any of that... guardian stuff!

26.「ガーディアンの本分は 守ること。| 功を競うことばかり考えていた オレが| 全: A Guardian's duty is to protect. All I did was|think about competing with others, and I was|wrong... all wrong...!

27.「オレを守りながら戦う 団長と <cs_pchero>の| 背中を見て ようやく:
A person who finally realizes this when he|sees the backs of the Commander and| fighting while protecting|
|me...has no Guardian Qualification.

28.「……若い時の過ちは 誰にでもあるものです。| 君は 自分の過ちに 自分で気が付: ...We all make mistakes when we are young.|You've realized your own mistakes. Then|there's only one thing I can say.

31.「君たちは 僕と守護騎士団にとって| 等しく必要で かけがえのない仲間です。|: You are equally necessary and irreplaceable|companions for me and my Guardians. Please|continue to lend me your support.

34.「さあ……本部で 君の手当てをしなければ。| 歩けますか セツラン君？: Come on... we'll have to patch you up at|headquarters. Can you walk, Mr. Setsuran?

35.「はい 大丈夫です。| オレも ガーディアンですから！: Yes, it's okay. I'm a Guardian too!

36.「<cs_pchero>君。渡したいものがあるので| 君も 本部に来てくださいね: <cs_pchero>. I have something to give you,|and you should come to headquarters too.
